toppy.topgg - Top.gg

class toppy.topgg.TopGGClient(client: ClientProtocol, /, token: str, *, interval: Optional[float] = None, post_shard_count: bool = False, start_on_ready: bool = True, session: Optional[aiohttp.ClientSession] = None)

A Client to access the Top.gg API. This includes auto-posting Discord Bot Stats and accessing data about other Discord Bots on Top.gg

https://top.gg/

client: Client

The Discord Bot instance. Any Client derived from discord.Client or any other fork’s Client

token: str

The DBL token found in the Webhooks tab of the bots owner only section.

interval: Optional[float]

The interval in seconds to auto-post the stats. Defaults to 600.

post_shard_count: bool

Decides whether to post the shard count along with the server count. Defaults to False.

start_on_ready: bool:

Whether to start the auto post task when the bot is ready. If False then it must be manually started with start Defaults to True

session: Optional[aiohttp.ClientSession]

The session for the HTTP Client.

interval: float

The interval in seconds to auto-post the stats.

cancel() → None

Cancels the task of auto posting stats

async check_if_voted(bot_id: Optional[int], user_id: int) → bool

Check if a user has voted on a bot

bot_id: Optional:class:int

The ID of the bot. Defaults to the Bot initialized with.

user_id: int

The ID of the user.

bool

async last_1000_votes(bot_id: Optional[int] = None, /) → AsyncIterator[toppy.topgg.user.User]

Get the last 1000 votes of a bot on Top.gg

bot_id: Optional[int]

The ID of the bot. Defaults to the Bot initialized with. Positional only.

User

async post_stats() → None

Post your bots stats to Top.gg All stats are automatically found and posted

dispatches topgg_autopost_error with the argument aiohttp.ClientResponseError or topgg_autopost_success with no arguments

async search_bots(query: str, *, limit: Optional[int] = None, offset: Optional[int] = None) → list[toppy.topgg.bot.Bot]

Search up bots on Top.gg

query: str

The query to use when searching.

limit: Optional[int]

The limit of Bot to return. Keyword only.

offset: Optional[int]

The amount of bots to skip in the results. Keyword only.

list[Bot]:

async search_one_bot(bot_id: int, /) → toppy.topgg.bot.Bot

Search a single bot on Top.gg

bot_id: int

The ID to search. Positional only.

Bot:

start() → None

Starts the autopost task.

property task: _asyncio.Task

The asyncio.Task object for autopost.
